alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 3:14AM EST until February 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation starts off as a period of snow, heavy at times late Wednesday afternoon and evening. The snow is then forecast to mix with and changeover to sleet and freezing rain later Wednesday night into Thursday. Periods of light freezing rain, rain or sleet continue during the day Thursday. Temperatures hover in the mid 20s to lower 30s through the event.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
